faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I change my plan anytime?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the next billing cycle.
faq.a2: We offer a 7-day free trial for all new students. No credit card required to start.
faq.q3: What if I miss a lesson?
faq.a3: All lessons are recorded and available for 30 days. You can also reschedule with 24-hour notice.
faq.a4: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with our service.
